event.title: was founded by Greek emigrants around the 7th century BC

data.event: According to some theories, Sori was founded by Greek emigrants around the 7th century BC.

event.title: 1548 the town was sacked and ravagaed

data.event: In 1548 the town was sacked and ravagaed by 1500 pirates from North Africa.
After the French domination, in 1815 Sori became part of the Kingdom of Sardinia, and from 1861 of the unified Kingdom of Italy.
